test.name: 4.6.11 STC OS UPGRADE CREATE NEW JOB-EXECUTION TIME LATER-SELECT TIME

kw.name: Testcase setup
Start Browser
kw.doc: Browser.start_browser(self, browser_name=u'firefox', download_path=None, screenshot_path=None, remote_url=None, flash=False, proxy_urls=None)

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "Opening the google chrome browser with the remote url http://selenium:4444/wd/hub "

kw.name: Login to BPA UI "${login.bpa_url}" with credentials "${login.bpa_username}" and "${login.bpa_password}"
set browser timeout to "${BPA__MAX_WAIT_TIME}" seconds
clear the browser cookies
visit "${url}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__TXT_UID_XPATH}"
enter "${username}" in the field with XPath "${BPA__TXT_UID_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__TXT_PWD_XPATH}"
enter "${password}" in the field with XPath "${BPA__TXT_PWD_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__BTN_LOGIN_XPATH}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__BTN_LOGIN_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__LBL_DASHBOARD_XPATH}"
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "Logging into console https://10.52.123.82/portal/#/login with the credentials admin and admin"

kw.name: set browser timeout to "${BPA__MAX_WAIT_TIME}" seconds
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "The max wait time of the browser window is 60 seconds"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: click on the object with XPath "${BPA_OS_UPGRADE_TILE_XPATH}"
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA_SELECT_DEVICE_LBL_TILE}"
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "Wait until SELECT DEVICE label is visible"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: STC upgrade select device "${osupgrade.device_name}"
kw.doc: This keyword retrieves list of devices in the selected BOA environment in STC.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "The device type selected for upgrade is ASR920"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__SELECT_CREATE_NEW_XPATH}"
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: click on the object with XPath "${BPA__SELECT_CREATE_NEW_XPATH}"
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "Job listing page of ASR920 : Create new is clicked"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: Create device values with later time "${osupgrade.create_new_later}"
kw.doc: This keyword retrieves list of devices in the selected BOA environment in STC.
kw.msg: The value of time present here is 15 The dict value of time passed here is 12:30

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "Select Platform Model: 'ASR-920-24TZ-M'\\n Select Device Role: 'UPE92'\\n Select Release Software Version: '3.18.5SP'\\n File Transfer Protocol: 'FTP'\\n mdt_number: 123\\n Approval Status: 'Approved'\\nmutilselect_device: 'STC-ASR920-1'"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__CREATE_NEW_SUBMIT}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__CREATE_NEW_SUBMIT}"
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "Submit button is clicked for the JOB"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: check xpath for the value message "${BPA__SELECT_TIME_VALUE}"
Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

arguments.arg: "xpath : verified the schedule time must be greater than current time is, verified"

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: Testcase teardown
Logout of BPA UI
set browser timeout to "${BPA__MAX_WAIT_TIME}" seconds
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__MENU_PROFILE_XPATH}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__MENU_PROFILE_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__MENU_LOGOUT_XPATH}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__MENU_LOGOUT_XPATH}"
close browser
